artist: Painter: After Richard Wilson; Engraver: Samuel William Reynolds I; Publisher: W. B. Cooke
description: landscape with three figures foreground center on river bank; trees and shrubs right; ruins right middle ground; distant hills
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in black:  Paintted by Richard Wilson, R.A.   Engraved by S.W. Reynolds/ Engraver to the King / MORNING / From a painting in the possession of Frederick Perking Esq\'r / GEMS OF ART  Plate 19 / London, Published Augst. 1st, 1824 by W.B. Cooke 9 Soho Square  | on sheer in pencil: 2-610
title: Morning
